title: English-Turkish Translation In Titles And Captions
context:
When encountering titles , headings, figure captions and table names in an English context, Include the Turkish translation of the title or table name in parentheses beside the English version.
Donot use this rule outside titles , headings, figure captions and table names.
In any overlapping scenario this rule is used for translation text.
Examples:
"# Customer Information " to "# Customer Information (Müşteri Bilgileri)"
" Table 3.1 Graph of responses" to "Tablo 3.1 Yanıt Grafiği"

title: Turkish Payment System Translation Glossary
context:
Specific translation phrases list for Turkish of payment system related text containing any translation .
Use existing rules for titles , headings, figure captions , table names and overlapping any of them.
key value pairs seperated by :
